title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 222: Featuring Jamal Mayers
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by former NHLer Jamal Mayers. Jamal joins to talk about his great work in the community with the Chicago Blackhawks, along with some hilarious stories from his career. The guys also talk about all the crazy NHL news, including the Bill Peters incident. The boys wrap up with some lighter talk including a gambling corner from RA.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
